org.forgerock.openig.log

Class FileLogSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openig.log.FileLogSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogSink

    public class FileLogSink
extends Object
implements LogSink
    A sink that writes log entries to a file.

           Charset charset)

        Parameters:
        file - output where entries will be written (default to UTF-8 Charset)
        charset - Character set to encode log output with

      • isLoggable

        public boolean isLoggable(Name source,
                 LogLevel level)
        Description copied from interface: LogSink
        Returns true if the entry may be logged based on its source and/or level. This does not guarantee that the entry will in fact be logged.
        Specified by:
        isLoggable in interface LogSink
        Parameters:
        source - the object and/or event related to the log entry.
        level - the logging level of the log entry.
        Returns:
        true if the entry may be logged.
